text: Ama edde yabne mari usun Yalli kicnim Abaanam kee Yalli Niqbiimik sinni yabbixeeh ken geyte musiibal yasbire mara, iimaan kee maxcoocaay Abnitte kak Nummatteeh Yallih Amri oggolaah kaah Rammita mara, Yalli keenih yecee maaluk Sadaqhatah tu-yaceeh Barak gimo (Maaci Bar kinnuk) Yallak dambi cabti essera mara kinnon
